findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled on WordPress API endpoints can allow attackers to read sensitive data cross-origin. This violates same-origin policy and enables data exfiltration attacks.
findings.exploitation_steps: 1. Host malicious JavaScript on attacker domain 2. Send CORS request to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with victim's cookies 3. Extract sensitive page data that should be protected by same-origin policy 4. Potentially access other WordPress API endpoints with same misconfiguration
